text: Heads-up on Sawtooth restructure.  We've moved most of core/ into validator/ including gossip, journal, and ledger.  Those are not backward compatible changes.  If you need the previous structure please use 0.6.

Got a quick question: is there a way to use the Web API to grab and store MarketPlace transactions that are of a specific type? i.e say I wanted to download a list of current offers on the ledger.  I understand you can  grab the contents of a specific transaction ID (found this on the wiki <https://gyazo.com/263215ad09146aba6763fc784f92d718> ) but not sure how to grab contents of transactions that are of a specific type. If anyone could help that would be awesome, cheers :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U21HV589Z> As I know, The Web API of transaction  has no type query parameter.  Here <http://intelledger.github.io/sawtooth_developers_guide/web_api/index.html>  is the doc of webapi
